Name: Fleece Collared Quarter-Zip Sweatshirt By Ralph Lauren
Short description: This collared sweatshirt is crafted with cotton-blend fleece and finished with a vintage-inspired label.
Description:
Polo collar. Quarter-zip placket.
Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Two front waist angled welt pockets. Ribbed hem. "RL Polo AC" label at the left hem.
87% cotton, 13% polyester (exclusive of decoration). Machine washable. Imported. .

Name: Polo Prepster Stretch Chino Short
Short description: Polo Prepster Stretch Chino Short By Ralph Lauren
Description:
Polo collar. Quarter-zip placket.
Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Stretch Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
Elastic waistband with an interior drawstring. Zip fly with a buttoned closure.
Side on-seam pockets. Two back buttoned pockets.
Signature embroidered Pony at the front left hem. .

Name: Polo Shirt
Short description: From its meticulous construction to its cotton mesh fabric, which only gets better with wear, Ralph Lauren’s Polo shirt has been an icon of American style since 1972.
Description:
100% cotton.
Machine washable. Imported.

Name: Full Sleeve Polo Shirt
Short description: From its meticulous construction to its cotton mesh fabric, which only gets better with wear, Ralph Lauren’s Polo shirt has been an icon of American style since 1972.
Description:
100% cotton.
Machine washable. Imported.

Name: Oversized Fit Cotton T-Shirt
Short description: Oversized Fit Cotton T-Shirt By H&M
Description: Oversized T-shirt in thick cotton jersey. Ribbed crew neck, dropped shoulders, and a straight-cut hem.

Name: Relaxed Fit Sweatpants
Description: Relaxed-fit sweatpants in medium weight cotton-blend fabric with a casual, but not oversized silhouette. Drawstring and covered elastic at waistband, side-seam pockets, and ribbed hems. Soft, brushed inside.

Name: Sports Cargo Joggers
Description: Regular-fit sports joggers in woven fabric with four-way stretch for added comfort and freedom of movement. Smocked elastic at waistband and drawstring with cord stopper. Side pockets with zipper, leg pockets with flap, and gently tapered legs with covered elastic at hems.

Name: Regular Fit Ripstop Cargo Pants
Short description: Regular Fit Ripstop Cargo Pants By H&M
Description: Regular-fit cargo pants in a durable, woven ripstop. Covered elastic and concealed drawstring at waistband, zip fly with snap fastener, and elastic drawstring at hem with cord stopper. Leg pockets with flap and concealed snap fasteners, welt back pockets, and side-seam pockets with concealed zipper.

Name: Regular Fit Sweatshort
Description: Regular-fit sweatshorts in lightweight, cotton-blend fabric with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Elasticized, drawstring waistband, side pockets, and an open back pocket.

Name: Regular Fit Chino Shorts
Short description: Regular Fit Chino Shorts By H&M
Description: Regular-fit chino shorts in soft cotton twill. Zip fly with button, diagonal side pockets, and welt back pockets.

Name: Regular Fit Nylon Cargo Shorts
Short description: Regular Fit Cargo Shorts By H&M
Description: Regular-fit shorts in nylon. Waistband with covered elastic, drawstring, and mock fly. Side pockets, back pockets, and leg pockets. Back pockets and leg pockets all with flap and concealed snap fasteners.

Name: Water-repellent Windbreaker
Description: Windbreaker in windproof, water-repellent nylon. Lined hood with elasticized drawstring. Zipper at front, long sleeves with covered elastic at cuffs, and a concealed, elasticized drawstring at hem. Diagonal side pockets with hook-loop fastener and an inner pocket with snap fastener. Lined.

Name: Regular Fit Twill Jacket
Short description: Regular Fit Twill Jacket By H&M
Description: Regular-fit jacket in cotton twill with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Collar, zipper at front, and long sleeves with button at cuffs. Diagonal welt front pockets, an inner pocket with snap fastener, and covered elastic at hem. Lined.

Name: Bomber Jacket
Description: Lightweight bomber jacket in woven fabric. Ribbed stand-up collar, zipper at front, and wide ribbing at cuffs and hem. Side pockets with concealed snap fastener and an inner pocket with snap fastener. Lined.

Name: Slim Jeans
Description: Straight-leg, 5-pocket jeans in cotton denim with gentle stretch for added comfort. Slim fit from waist through thighs. Regular waist and zip fly. Easily styled for a sleek or sporty look.

Name: Loose Jeans
Description: 5-pocket jeans in non-stretch cotton denim. Rounded legs and loose fit from seat to hem for extra room around legs. Regular waist, zip fly, dropped gusset, and large knee patches. Complete the look with a plain T-shirt.

Name: Straight Regular Jeans
Description: Straight-leg, 5-pocket jeans in rigid cotton denim. Regular fit with a comfortable, looser feel around legs. Regular waist and a button fly. Designed for everyday wear.
